rules.install:
cd $BOLT_SOURCE_DIR
if [ "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" != "/tools" ]; then make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install else install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/tools" install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/tools/bin" install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/tools/include" install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/tools/lib" install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/tools/libexec" install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/tools/sbin" install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/tools/share"
for entry in etc var run tmp; do ln -sf "../$entry" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/tools/$entry" done fi
